properties.name: mode
properties.description: The mode of the date pickerValues: date | time | datetime

properties.name: date
properties.description: Selected date

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: Minimum dateDefault: empty String

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: Maximum dateDefault?: empty String

properties.name: titleText
properties.description: Label for the dialog title. If empty, uses android default (Set date/Set time).Default?: empty String

properties.name: okText
properties.description: Label of BUTTON_POSITIVE (done button) on Android

properties.name: cancelText
properties.description: Label of BUTTON_NEGATIVE (cancel button). If empty, uses android.R.string.cancel.

properties.name: todayText
properties.description: Label of today button. If empty, doesn't show the option to select current date.

properties.name: nowText
properties.description: Label of now button. If empty, doesn't show the option to select current time.

properties.name: is24Hour
properties.description: Shows time dialog in 24 hours format.

properties.name: androidTheme
properties.description: Choose the Android theme for the picker. You can use the DatePicker.ANDROID_THEMES property.Values: 1: THEME_TRADITIONAL | 2: THEME_HOLO_DARK | 3: THEME_HOLO_LIGHT | 4: THEME_DEVICE_DEFAULT_DARK | 5: THEME_DEVICE_DEFAULT_LIGHT

properties.name: allowOldDates
properties.description: Shows or hide dates earlier then selected date.

properties.name: allowFutureDates
properties.description: Shows or hide dates after selected date.

properties.name: doneButtonLabel
properties.description: Label of done button.

properties.name: doneButtonColor
properties.description: Hex color of done button.

properties.name: cancelButtonLabel
properties.description: Label of cancel button.

properties.name: cancelButtonColor
properties.description: Hex color of cancel button.

properties.name: x
properties.description: X position of date picker. The position is absolute to the root view of the application.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Y position of date picker. The position is absolute to the root view of the application.

properties.name: minuteInterval
properties.description: Interval between options in the minute section of the date picker.

properties.name: popoverArrowDirection
properties.description: Force the UIPopoverArrowDirection enum. The value any will revert to default UIPopoverArrowDirectionAny and let the app choose the proper direction itself.

properties.name: locale
properties.description: Force locale for datePicker.
